text: Saad El-Din Rafik Al-Hariri (; born 18 April 1970) is a Lebanese politician. He was the 33rd Prime Minister of Lebanon from December 2016 to January 2020. He was also the Prime Minister from November 2009 to June 2011. On 29 October 2019, amid the 2019 Lebanese protests, Hariri announced his resignation, and that of his cabinet. ==References== ==Other websites== *Future Movement's Official Site *March 14 Alliance's Official Site *To Live and Die in Beirut, A portfolio of Saad Hariri Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Lebanon
title: Saad Hariri
